channel.title: Avarrocka I - Released with Server & Client. (Version 1)
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/l88qdts.png[/img][/center]
Let's start with a simple algorithm! [b]If (you're hoping to find):[/b]
[ul][li]An already fully made ready-to-be-hosted server.[/li] [li]A half-assed Project Insanity or other winter-love based server.[/li][/ul]
[i]You can close your internet browser![/i]
[hr] This is somehow the most advanced server/client I ever had. As mentioned before, this isn't a fully done server that you may host. However, this is a exceptional base to start with. I've been in development in this project since last July. This isn't the latest version of Avarrocka as Avarrocka II(2) has been launched. You may also see the progress [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,655252.0.html]here[/url]. Anyway, let's keep on track. I'll start by saying the both bases used:
[ul][li][b]Server: [/b]Apollo - Graham[/li] [li][b]Client: [/b]317 Refactored - Artem[/li][/ul]
[b]Server[/b][hr] Server was mainly edited by Steve(my partner). He wrote himself few others ruby plugins and made an outstanding Apollo base.
[b]Server features:[/b]
[ul][li]25% of the source is ruby scripts![/li] [li]Full region system (scratch)[/li] [li]Clipping system[/li] [li]Almost all skills (maybe I have them all, I forget)[/li] [li]Server settings[/li] [li]RSA & crc authentication[/li] [li]Updated plugin system[/li] [li]Very good combat base to work from[/li] [li]Private chat system[/li] [li]Npc walking[/li] [li]Runescape shops[/li] [li]Runescape npc spawns[/li] [li]IRC intergation, (plugin called KServ, edit info in irc.rb)[/li] [li]Minigame system, you can work off of it very well[/li] [li]API (worked off of Singlehop's system, thought their design was neat)[/li] [li]Shop system with lowering item counts, etc.[/li] [li]Editable vote system, easy to implement, no sql needed.[/li] [li]Flawless design, still maintained the original Apollo source comments.[/li] [li]A lot... a lot more.[/li][/ul]
Server Download: http://up.ht/1gjgNVE
[b]Client[/b][hr] [i]Note: I know, few names says "Astrect". This is because I merged it with another server called Astrect and I actually renamed few things. But this is fully Avarrocka I client.[/i]
[u]Avarrocka client is a master piece.[/u] I still regret to release this as this is the beginning of my future big project. This isn't probably as advanced as [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,655252.msg4387389.html#msg4387389]Avarrocka II[/url]. But it's still a huge start! Here is few [b]code samples[/b] to look( I am really feeling disapointed as I've already rewrote all of this in Avarrocka II):
[ul][li][url=http://pastebin.com/2uWnmvYr]Gameframe.java[/url][/li] [li][url=http://pastebin.com/DgwkHfF3]Rasterizer2D.java[/url][/li] [li][url=http://pastebin.com/44HSygjM]ThreadUtil.java[/url][/li][/ul]
[center][b]Main part of the packaging:[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Z7KSy5i.png[/img]
Download: http://uppit.com/y9iw636lh71a/client.rar
[hr]
Also few youtube links you may look into to find more about [b]client based systems[/b]:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VoZPaJefV1Y
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cvxqwpQThnc[/center]
[hr][hr]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/8LPcxeZ.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/DWc8btM.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/iVRLlB1.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/U8rZeRa.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Aj6jxwM.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/JcrPT3w.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5MYV4rm.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/eVu85PZ.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/qoNYlE2.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/pXrZxif.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/lXF6wMY.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/hlVV8nl.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/82aIGsN.png[/img][/center]
[hr][hr]
[size=18pt][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,655252.msg4387389.html#msg4387389]Please give support the the next version of this project. It is going to be better than ever! Beta is coming soon![/url][/size]
